pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fred====Python wrapper of the St. Louis Federal Reserve Bank's [FRED API webservice](http://api.stlouisfed.org/docs/fred/) for retrieving economic data.FRED API Documentation:[http://api.stlouisfed.org/docs/fred/](http://api.stlouisfed.org/docs/fred/)Sign up for a FRED API key:[http://api.stlouisfed.org/api_key.html](http://api.stlouisfed.org/api_key.html)
